sections.Name: Session
sections.Description: Session level messages to establish and control a FIX session

sections.Name: PreTrade
sections.Description: Pre trade messages including reference data, market data, quoting, news and email, indication of interest

sections.Name: PostTrade
sections.Description: Post trade messages including trade reporting, allocation, collateral, confirmation, position mantemenance, registration instruction, and settlement instructions

sections.Name: Infrastructure
sections.Description: Infrastructure messages for application sequencing, business reject, network and user management
